Text: 150 MB seemed a little low for an hour long episode, but quality was fine after I re-encoded all of them at 624x352 with Handbrake.
^ omg noob. you could have done nothing except made them worse

To the contrary, 160 MB per 60 min is about 360 kbits/sec, which is really not sufficient for true 848x480 video, even when using the x264 codec.

Up until last year, the standard res for HDTV was 624x352, and I still find it perfectly satisfactory.
